messages.message: Hey all, we are scoping out building a platform status dashboard (like https://www.githubstatus.com/) for Instabase deployments. We would love to get feedback from everyone on what information would be useful to show on this dashboard. Would really appreciate it if you all filled out this form https://forms.gle/5rQXqjvk4HHY4HWp7  :pray: :ty:. Also please share any thoughts on adding / modifying questions or adding choices to an existing question in the form. Should take ~5-10 min to fill out, thanks!
Please involve @jtau and @Aaron Tami who are in the process of building our Admiral
The feature sets are going to be overlapping, so we want to make sure that we are spending time wisely on overlapping projects
@Pridhvi Vegesna lets chat, this is very similar to what we are building

Thanks for the callout, definitely want to make sure we are not duplicating engineering effort or overlapping projects.

Continuing the discussion on a thread with Aaron and Jtau
@Pridhvi Vegesna if possible please include me in the discussion
